00019 /*
00020  *  libpsht is being developed at the Max-Planck-Institut fuer Astrophysik

00025 /*! \file psht_test.c
00026     Accuracy test for libpsht's map analysis.
00027 
00028     This program first generates a_lm coefficients up to
00029     a user-specified lmax (with mmax=lmax); where applicable, the
00030     real and imaginary parts of the coefficients are uniform
00031     random numbers of the interval [-1;1[.
00032     Afterwards, the random a_lm are converted to a map.
00033     This map is analyzed (optionally using an iterative scheme
00034     with a user-supplied number of steps).
00035     After every iteration, the code then outputs the RMS of the residual a_lm
00036     (i.e. the difference between the current and original a_lm), divided by
00037     the RMS of the original a_lm, as well as the maximum absolute change of any
00038     real or imaginary part between the current and original a_lm.
00039 
00040     This operation can be performed for several different pixelisations:
00041       - a Gaussian with the minimal number of rings for exact analysis
00042         and a user-defined ring resolution
00043       - an ECP grid with the minimal number of rings for exact analysis
00044         and a user-defined ring resolution
00045       - a Healpix grid with a user-defined Nside parameter.
00046 
00047     The user can specify the spin of the desired transform.
00048 
00049     Copyright (C) 2006-2010 Max-Planck-Society
00050     \author Martin Reinecke
00051 */
00052 
00053 #include <stdio.h>
00054 #include <string.h>
00055 #include "psht.h"
00056 #include "psht_geomhelpers.h"
00057 #include "psht_almhelpers.h"
00058 #include "c_utils.h"
00059 #include "walltime_c.h"
00060 
00061 static double drand (double min, double max)
00062   {
00063   return min + (max-min)*rand()/(RAND_MAX+1.0);
00064   }
00065 
00066 static void random_alm (pshtd_cmplx *alm, psht_alm_info *helper, int spin)
00067   {
00068   int l,m;
00069   for (m=0;m<=helper->mmax; ++m)
00070     for (l=m;l<=helper->lmax; ++l)
00071       {
00072       if ((l<spin)&&(m<spin))
00073         alm[psht_alm_index(helper,l,m)] = pshtd_cmplx_null;
00074       else
00075         {
00076         alm[psht_alm_index(helper,l,m)].re = drand(-1,1);
00077         alm[psht_alm_index(helper,l,m)].im = (m==0) ? 0 : drand(-1,1);
00078         }
00079       }
00080   }
00081 
00082 static void measure_errors (pshtd_cmplx **alm, pshtd_cmplx **alm2,
00083   ptrdiff_t nalms, int ncomp)
00084   {
00085   int i;
00086   ptrdiff_t m;
00087 
00088   for (i=0; i<ncomp; ++i)
00089     {
00090     double sum=0, sum2=0, maxdiff=0;
00091     for (m=0; m<nalms; ++m)
00092       {
00093       double x=alm[i][m].re-alm2[i][m].re, y=alm[i][m].im-alm2[i][m].im;
00094       sum+=x*x+y*y;
00095       sum2+=alm[i][m].re*alm[i][m].re+alm[i][m].im*alm[i][m].im;
00096       if (fabs(x)>maxdiff) maxdiff=fabs(x);
00097       if (fabs(y)>maxdiff) maxdiff=fabs(y);
00098       }
00099     sum=sqrt(sum/nalms);
00100     sum2=sqrt(sum2/nalms);
00101     printf("component %i: rms %e, maxerr %e\n",i, sum/sum2, maxdiff);
00102     }
00103   }
00104 
00105 static void map2alm_iter (psht_geom_info *tinfo, double **map,
00106   pshtd_cmplx **alm_orig, pshtd_cmplx **alm, int lmax, int mmax,
00107   ptrdiff_t npix, ptrdiff_t nalms, int spin, int niter)
00108   {
00109   psht_alm_info *alms;
00110   pshtd_joblist *joblist;
00111   int ncomp = (spin==0) ? 1 : 2;
00112   int iter,i;
00113   ptrdiff_t m;
00114   double timer;
00115 
00116   psht_make_triangular_alm_info(lmax,mmax,1,&alms);
00117   pshtd_make_joblist (&joblist);
00118 
00119   if (spin==0)
00120     pshtd_add_job_map2alm(joblist,map[0],alm[0],0);
00121   else
00122     pshtd_add_job_map2alm_spin(joblist,map[0],map[1],alm[0],alm[1],spin,0);
00123   timer=wallTime();
00124   pshtd_execute_jobs (joblist, tinfo, alms);
00125   printf("wall time for map2alm: %fs\n",wallTime()-timer);
00126   pshtd_clear_joblist (joblist);
00127   measure_errors(alm_orig,alm,nalms,ncomp);
00128 
00129   for (iter=0; iter<niter; ++iter)
00130     {
00131     double **map2;
00132     ALLOC2D(map2,double,ncomp,npix);
00133     printf ("\niteration %i:\n", iter+1);
00134     if (spin==0)
00135       pshtd_add_job_alm2map(joblist,alm[0],map2[0],0);
00136     else
00137       pshtd_add_job_alm2map_spin(joblist,alm[0],alm[1],map2[0],map2[1],spin,0);
00138     timer=wallTime();
00139     pshtd_execute_jobs (joblist, tinfo, alms);
00140     printf("wall time for alm2map: %fs\n",wallTime()-timer);
00141     pshtd_clear_joblist (joblist);
00142     for (i=0; i<ncomp; ++i)
00143       for (m=0; m<npix; ++m)
00144         map2[i][m] = map[i][m]-map2[i][m];
00145 
00146     if (spin==0)
00147       pshtd_add_job_map2alm(joblist,map2[0],alm[0],1);
00148     else
00149       pshtd_add_job_map2alm_spin(joblist,map2[0],map2[1],alm[0],alm[1],spin,1);
00150     timer=wallTime();
00151     pshtd_execute_jobs (joblist, tinfo, alms);
00152     printf("wall time for map2alm: %fs\n",wallTime()-timer);
00153     pshtd_clear_joblist (joblist);
00154     DEALLOC2D(map2);
00155     measure_errors(alm_orig,alm,nalms,ncomp);
00156     }
00157 
00158   psht_destroy_alm_info(alms);
00159   pshtd_destroy_joblist(joblist);
00160   }
00161 
00162 static void check_accuracy (psht_geom_info *tinfo, ptrdiff_t lmax,
00163   ptrdiff_t mmax, ptrdiff_t npix, int spin, int niter)
00164   {
00165   psht_alm_info *alms;
00166   pshtd_joblist *joblist;
00167   double **map;
00168   pshtd_cmplx **alm, **alm2;
00169   ptrdiff_t nalms = ((mmax+1)*(mmax+2))/2 + (mmax+1)*(lmax-mmax);
00170   int ncomp = (spin==0) ? 1 : 2;
00171   double timer;
00172 
00173   ALLOC2D(map,double,ncomp,npix);
00174 
00175   psht_make_triangular_alm_info(lmax,mmax,1,&alms);
00176   pshtd_make_joblist (&joblist);
00177 
00178   srand(4);
00179   ALLOC2D(alm,pshtd_cmplx,ncomp,nalms);
00180   random_alm(alm[0],alms,spin);
00181   if (spin>0)
00182     random_alm(alm[1],alms,spin);
00183 
00184   ALLOC2D(alm2,pshtd_cmplx,ncomp,nalms);
00185 
00186   printf ("\niteration 0:\n");
00187   if (spin==0)
00188     pshtd_add_job_alm2map(joblist,alm[0],map[0],0);
00189   else
00190     pshtd_add_job_alm2map_spin(joblist,alm[0],alm[1],map[0],map[1],spin,0);
00191   timer=wallTime();
00192   pshtd_execute_jobs (joblist, tinfo, alms);
00193   printf("wall time for alm2map: %fs\n",wallTime()-timer);
00194   pshtd_clear_joblist (joblist);
00195 
00196   map2alm_iter(tinfo, map, alm, alm2, lmax, mmax, npix, nalms, spin, niter);
00197 
00198   DEALLOC2D(map);
00199   DEALLOC2D(alm);
00200   DEALLOC2D(alm2);
00201 
00202   psht_destroy_alm_info(alms);
00203   pshtd_destroy_joblist(joblist);
00204   }
00205 
00206 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00207   {
00208   int lmax;
00209   int spin;
00210   int niter;
00211   psht_geom_info *tinfo;
00212 
00213   UTIL_ASSERT (argc==6,
00214     "usage: psht_test <healpix|ecp|gauss> <lmax> <nside|nphi> <niter> <spin>");
00215   lmax=atoi(argv[2]);
00216   niter=atoi(argv[4]);
00217   spin=atoi(argv[5]);
00218 
00219   printf("Testing map analysis accuracy.\n");
00220   printf("lmax=%d, %d iterations, spin=%d\n", lmax, niter, spin);
00221 
00222   if (strcmp(argv[1],"gauss")==0)
00223     {
00224     int nrings=lmax+1;
00225     int ppring=atoi(argv[3]);
00226     ptrdiff_t npix=(ptrdiff_t)nrings*ppring;
00227     printf("\nTesting Gaussian grid (%d rings, %d pixels/ring, %ld pixels)\n",
00228           nrings,ppring,(long)npix);
00229     psht_make_gauss_geom_info (nrings, ppring, 1, &tinfo);
00230     check_accuracy(tinfo,lmax,lmax,npix,spin,niter);
00231     psht_destroy_geom_info(tinfo);
00232     }
00233   else if (strcmp(argv[1],"ecp")==0)
00234     {
00235     int nrings=2*lmax+2;
00236     int ppring=atoi(argv[3]);
00237     ptrdiff_t npix=(ptrdiff_t)nrings*ppring;
00238     printf("\nTesting ECP grid (%d rings, %d pixels/ring, %ld pixels)\n",
00239           nrings,ppring,(long)npix);
00240     psht_make_ecp_geom_info (nrings, ppring, 0., 1, &tinfo);
00241     check_accuracy(tinfo,lmax,lmax,npix,spin,niter);
00242     psht_destroy_geom_info(tinfo);
00243     }
00244   else if (strcmp(argv[1],"healpix")==0)
00245     {
00246     int nside=atoi(argv[3]);
00247     ptrdiff_t npix;
00248     if (nside<1) nside=1;
00249     npix=12*(ptrdiff_t)nside*nside;
00250     printf("\nTesting Healpix grid (nside=%d, %ld pixels)\n",
00251           nside,(long)npix);
00252     psht_make_healpix_geom_info (nside, 1, &tinfo);
00253     check_accuracy(tinfo,lmax,lmax,npix,spin,niter);
00254     psht_destroy_geom_info(tinfo);
00255     }
00256   else
00257     UTIL_FAIL("unknown grid geometry");
00258 
00259   return 0;
00260   }
